tooltips.expiryDate: This Quest will expire at 23:59 on the selected date. If no date is selected, it will have no expiration
tooltips.platform: The user will participate in the Quest on selected platform
tooltips.point: The user will earn points upon completing the Quest
tooltips.accountRanks: The Quest will be displayed to accounts with the corresponding rank
tooltips.uploadImage: Require user upload evidence by providing an image or screenshot
tooltips.enterLink: Require user upload evidence by entering link (Facebook link, Instagram link...)
tooltips.allowMultiple: Allows users to participate in the Quest multiple times.

validation.emailRequired: Please fill out out this field
validation.emailNotExist: Email does not exist in registered users
validation.emailDuplicate: This email has already been added
validation.selectRank: Please select at least one account rank
validation.requireOne: At least one requirement must be selected
validation.imageOrLinkRequired: At least required image or required link checked
validation.questAddFailed: Failed to add quest. Please try again.
